comments:
New a report, create a regular chart and preview. Though the chart image is generated, a ClassCastException is thrown out. The handle here actually is an ExtendedItemHandle, not an ImageHandle.

------------------------------------------------------------------------
There are errors on the report page:
- There are error(s) in Chart : 580
